Oct 29, 2004

10 years

How did my Ph.D. take 10 years? First of all, that is the *average* for a Ph.D. in Anthropology, so it is no big deal. Secondly, it doesn’t seem that long when you divide it into three stages: taking classes (3 years), applying for grants, language study, and doing field work (4 years), and writing up the thesis (3 years). Because anthropo...
